InputOrientation.description: Is the orientation directory you want to perform the adjustment on (absolute orientation computed previously Center Bascule)

OutputOrientation.description: Output Orientation Directory, after compensation (automatically automatically renamed Ori-name of the directory)

EmGPS.description: Specifies that you use GPS positions stored in the Ori_GPS orientation directory (step Oriconvert) and having the declared uncertainty (in ground unit, e.g. meters).

Timeout.description: integer; expressed in seconds. Avoid to wait undefined time after campari command execution
